outboundReferences.contextLine: A type of causal model; for the case of [[causal-navigation-by-continuous-time-neural-networks]], given a dynamical system governed by:

fields.title: Causal Navigation by Continuous time Neural Networks

inboundReferences.contextLine: - A specific case, as in the liquid time-constant networks, resemble a type of causal model called [[dynamic causal model]] with a bilinear Taylor approximation; DCMs are designed specifically to capture both internal and external causes on a dynamical system, which fulfills our condition from earlier.

fields.title: Causal Navigation by Continuous time Neural Networks
